history.content:
Volunteers Needed for Expanding Your Horizons Conference

We need YOU at Expanding Your Horizons!

EYH is a conference for 5th - 8th graders that seeks to promote womxn in science and introduce young people to careers in STEM through an array of fun, interactive workshops.


When: Saturday, March 9, 2019 from 7:00 AM - 4:30 PM

Where: University of California, Berkeley


This year we will be hosting 450 conference attendees from surrounding East Bay communities.  Volunteers will assist workshop leaders, join our young participants for lunch, share their STEM experience, and act as positive role models throughout the day. We do ask that undergraduate volunteers are womxn or non- binary identified.


In addition to conference day participation, volunteers are REQUIRED to attend a training session.

Sign up to be an volunteer here.

Questions? E-mail us at eyh.ucb.volunteer@gmail.com

We look forward to seeing you!
history.subject: Expanding your Horizons (EYH) Conference - volunteers needed!
